attributes.action: Reduce "Long Term Residence"from 10 years to 7 years,a realistic approach to appreciate the contribution of foreign nationals and allow them to get permanant residence after 7 years instead of 10
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Foreign nationals who are in the UK legally for years but do not qualify for Highly skilled visas or work permit are allowed to apply for indefinite leave to remain after 10 years lawful residence. This usually takes more as their application is reviewed by burucratic officials in the Home office and we all know they are expert in time-wasting discouraging people to apply in this catagory.This time period should be reduced to 7 years to realise and appreciate those people who abide by the laws and keep their stay here legal.
